bibl.title: New Finds of Greek Epitaphs at Dongola.
bibl.note: Publication of 22 stelae unearthed at the archaeological site of Dongola. - Pp. 89-94: J.v.d.V., Appendix. Two coptic epitaphs.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Adam Łajtar, with an appendix by Jacques van der Vliet, New Finds of Greek Epitaphs at Dongola.

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 37-94, 19 figg.
Publication of 22 stelae unearthed at the archaeological site of Dongola. - Pp. 89-94: J.v.d.V., Appendix. Two coptic epitaphs.
